text.section: The Secretary may dispose of excess personal property and surplus personal property as provided in this section.

section.section: Whenever feasible, the Secretary shall dispose of excess personal property by transferring it to another unit of the State government.
The unit of the State government that receives the excess personal property shall pay any cost of the transfer.

text.section:
The Secretary:
may dispose of any surplus personal property; and
shall seek to gain the maximum value for the State in the disposition.

section.section: If surplus personal property is destroyed under this subsection, the unit of the State government that declared the item to be excess personal property shall pay any cost of destruction.

text.section: The Secretary may delegate the authority to dispose of surplus personal property to a designee of the Secretary or, by regulation, to another unit of the State government.
